results.name: Numerators in expansion of exp(2x)/(1-x).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400
mathematica: Numerator[Accumulate[Table[2^n/n!,{n,0,30}]]] (* or *) Numerator[ CoefficientList[ Series[Exp[2x]/(1-x),{x,0,30}],x] ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 12 2017 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 15 2000
